```{r }
library(recharts)
```
# Line Plot
```{r results='asis'}
eLine(iris[,1:4])
eLine(iris[,1:4], opt=list(dataZoom=list(show=TRUE,end=35)))
```

# Area Plot
```{r results='asis'}
eArea(iris[,1:4])
```

# Scatter Plot
```{r results='asis'}
ePoints(iris[,3:5])
```

# Pie Plot
```{r results='asis'}
x = sample(4)
names(x) = LETTERS[1:4]
ePie(iris[,3:5])
```

# Bar Plot
```{r results='asis'}
eBar(iris[1:5,1:4])
```

# Map
```{r results='asis'}
options(encoding="UTF-8")
Sys.setlocale("LC_CTYPE","chs")
load(url('http://yzhou.org/recharts/ChinaGDP.RData'))
eMap(ChinaGDP, opt=list(title=list(text='2008~2010年大陆各省GDP占全国百分数')))
```
